title: Distributed Deep Learning Simulation Education Based on 6G Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics (algebra/geometry), network concepts, and beginner-level machine learning knowledge
context.additional_context: Technology convergence education for office/administrative professionals conducted outside of work hours

learning_goals: One can explain the impact of 6G network's uRLLC (ultra-reliable low-latency communication) characteristics on distributed deep learning.
One can design a CNN model training process in a 6G environment using simulation tools.
One can complete a project verifying the reliability of distributed learning models by applying blockchain-based consensus algorithms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
